jMath.linalg
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  jMath.linalg.Matrix

public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object

a class of Matrix operations

Version:
1.0, Feb. 2010, 1.1, June 2010 uses Apache Commons math library no longer static - encapsulates a matrix object
Author:
S. Andrew Ning

solve

public Vector solve(Vector b)
solve least squares solution to a linear system of equations Ax = b Assumes A is dense. If there is some structure in A that you can exploit you should be using a different method.
